entries.meaning: The act of condescending; a manner of behaving in an outwardly polite way that nevertheless implies superiority to another; patronizing courtesy toward inferiors.
examples: Conscious condescension breeds panderers and enemies, not friends.

entries.meaning: (usually uncountable, derogatory) A patronizing attitude or behavior. [from 1930s]
(archaic, non-derogatory) Courtesy, affability of a superior towards an inferior.
